description: Listed Building Consent in connection with infill extension between the rear addition and party fence wall at basement (garden) level to accommodate new kitchen.  Formation of roof terrace to extension.  Reduction of floor level in existing rear addition to form shower room.  Combining existing door and former door openings to form connection with new extension.  Opening up fire place in existing chimney breast in rear (dining) room at basement level.  Installation of new secure gate to under pavement vault.  Repair/replacement roof covering to rear addition.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
